remarks: The LUB of elements less than or equal to a fixed value equals that value.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 7-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lubid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lubid.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lubid.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubid.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
lubid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
lubid $p |- ( ph -> ( U ` { y e. B | y .<_ X } ) = X ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B y $.
$d X y $.
